name: Abyss Gunslinger
description:
You're a lone gunslinger trapped in a strange abyss, fighting off strange monsters. 

How long will you last until you lose all your humanity?

WASD to move, space bar to shoot

In general this is more of a test of engine for future projects.

If you have some bugs or issues don't hesitate on commenting!

Background and banner art by My Bae
